import Navbar from './Navbar' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Profile() { const [name, setName] = useState(null) const [age, setAge] = useState(null) const [gender, setGender] = useState(null) const [height, setHeight] = useState(null) const [weight, setWeight] = useState(null) const [disable, setDisable] = useState(true) useEffect( async () => { const users = (await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/get')).data const storageUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).name const user = users.filter((user) => user.name === storageUser )[0] setName(user?.name) setAge(user?.weight) setGender(user?.gender) setHeight(user?.height) setWeight(user?.weight) }, []) console.log(gender) const handleOnSubmit = () => { setDisable(true) const user = { name: name, age: age, gender: gender, height: height, weight: weight, } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/update/profile', user) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return ( <>
setGender('male') } />
setGender('female') } />
setAge(e.target.value)}/>
setWeight(e.target.value)}/>
); } export default Profile;
